homepage.features.one.description.message: Wave is built to handle everything from low-level system programming to high-level applications, offering flexibility and performance in one unified language.

homepage.features.two.description.message: With Wave, you can concentrate on solving complex problems directly, using a single language across diverse domains like web development, AI, and hardware.

homepage.features.three.description.message: Wave allows you to write high-performance code that runs efficiently on any platform, without compromising on ease of use or safety.
